title: FS - T206 Foster SLer (reduced) and McGraw Glove at Hip (sold)
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS - T206 Foster SLer (reduced) and McGraw Glove at Hip (sold)
posts.post_content:
For sale 2 very nice cards (will consider reasonable offers):

T206 Ed Foster Old Mill - SGC 3 Southern Leaguer (super sharp card)  relisted at lower prices..

T206 McGraw Glove at Hip P350-460 SGC 2.5 No creases or folds $OLD 

Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Bob I.
Bump one sold the other reduced.
